content: learn how to take a traditional eight point crochet star and turn it into a modern piece of art while star blankets are usually just that a star shape in this pattern you ll square the points off to create a more practical and contemporary blanket crochet a baby blanket couch throw or customize an afghan any size you wish as written this crochet star blanket pattern is approximately 38 x 38 but instructions are included for easily modifying the size pattern calls for a worsted weight category 4 yarn and can be a nice way to pair scrap yarn with a solid color pattern pdf includes a written pattern and detailed photo tutorial the photos are separate from the written pattern so you can choose to print them or conserve ink this pattern originally appeared on make & do crew sizing/measurements - approx 38 x 38 downloading - this listing is for the rising star blanket crochet pattern pdf only pattern pdf will be available for instant download upon payment copyright/making finished items - thank you for sharing my patterns and tutorials when you do it helps support the blog and my ability to create more patterns which by the way i seriously love to do so really i mean it thank you you may make items to sell with this pattern/tutorial in exchange i ask that you link back to makeanddocrew com do not use my photos as your own sales photos do not distribute my patterns/templates as your own permission is not granted for mass production or factory manufacturing of any kind return policy - as this is a digital product i do not offer returns you can find all our free modern crochet blanket patterns here 1 1 https //makeanddocrew com/category/crochet/blankets/
